title: Rock worm
data:
{{obsolete}} {{list of|worms}} {{monster |name=rock worm |glyph={{Brown|w}} |tile=[[File:Rock worm.png]] |flags={{No skeleton flag}} |resistances={{Fire resistance}}, {{Cold resistance}},
{{Electricity resistance}}, {{Poison resistance}} |vulnerabilities=None |max_chunks=4 |meat={{Contaminated corpse}} |xp=168 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=20 |hp_range=27-48 |avg_hp=37 |armour_class=3 |evasion=12 |habitat=Rock |speed= 12 |size={{Large}} |item_use={{Uses nothing}} |attack1=22 ({{Bite type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=5 |base_hp=5 |extra_hp=5 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{Plant intelligence}} |genus=worm |species=rock worm }} {{Flavour|A large worm which moves through rock as if it were air.}} ==Useful Info== '''Rocks worms''' are irritating foes that move quickly and have the unusual ability to travel freely and ''quickly'' through rock and stone [[wall]]s. While they aren't particularly dangerous normally, they are nearly invulnerable when encased in a wall, but will still be able to bite you. They can be found in the middle-[[Dungeon]], [[the Lair]], and in worm [[vault]]s. ==Tips & Tricks== *Try luring rock worms out into the open. As they no longer flee, you don't need to lure them more than one square out of their walls. *The following spells still affect rock worms even when they're hiding in a wall: [[Disintegration]], [[Freeze]], [[Vampiric Draining]], [[Smiting]], [[Torment]], [[Agony]], [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]], and [[Shatter]]. You can also [[Dig]] them to take away their hiding place. ==History== These were removed in [[0.14]], likely due to the sheer irritation they caused. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
